task.title: Open an Existing Drawing
task.shortdesc: You can open drawing (.dwg) files, Drawing Exchange Format (.dxf) files and drawing template (.dwt) files. You can also open and check drawings that you suspect are damaged.

step.cmd: On the File menu, click Open.
In Files of Type, choose the type of file you want to open.
Choose the folder containing the desired file.
Choose the drawing you want to open, and then click Open. Or double-click the drawing youwant to open.

result.p: TIP You can also open drawings while browsing files on your computer using programs that came with your operating systems, such as Windows File Explorer or My Computer. Just double-click the file to get it open in ZWCAD. Easily find the drawing you want by viewing thumbnail images of the drawing files as you browse them.
TIP To quickly open a drawing file that you recently used, choose File > <file name> from the main menu.
